original_text: But when you give to the needy, do not let your left hand know what your right hand is doing,
korean_text: 너는 구제할 때에 오른손이 하는 것을 왼손이 모르게 하여

sentences.original_text: But when you give to the needy
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 네가 궁핍한 자에게 줄 때에

sentences.original_text: do not let your left hand know
what your right hand is doing
